pitch.cc: Tommy Hunter may be running out of gas after 72 pitches; his fastball has dropped from a high of 95 to as low as 86.
That was pitch number 75 for Tommy Hunter; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .267 average in the first 75 pitches but they hit .326 off him after that.
